item.title: About us
item.description: ðŸ¤© What Drives Us About Abistama We're all about making your work life a whole lot easier and a bit more fun. We're a small but mighty team of tech enthusiasts, passionate about creating seamless integrations and innovative solutions for your favorite tools like Slack and Jira. Simple Solutions We create tools that solve real problems. Abistama turns Slack reactions into Jira tickets, making project management effortless. User-Driven Our users' needs guide our development.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Last update on July 2024 Introduction Abistama Solutions OÃœ ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Slack application ("Abistama" or "the Application"). If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us at contact@abistama.com. Your use of our website is also governed by our Privacy Policy.

item.title: Terms of Service
item.description: Terms of Service Last update on July, 9th 2024 Terms of Service These Terms of Service are a contract between you and Abistama Solutions OÃœ (referred to as "Abistama"). By using the Services of Abistama on Slack or any other applications that give access to Abistama, you agree to be bound by the following Terms of Use. If a user violates any of the terms outlined below, we reserve the right to cancel accounts or bar access to accounts without notice.

item.title: Your Jira Cloud is ready
item.description: Your Jira Cloud is now linked to Abistama! You can now configure it in your Slack, in the "Abistama" application.
